topics.body:
I know it's partially about SJW, but cheshirecat made a good point about female gamers:
!http://cheshirecatstudios.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/gender-equality-in-gaming.jpg!

Half of gamers are women and a lot of companies still treat women like they only play angry birds and then there's SJW who feel like they need to "tear down the boy's club" and shit.  Women just want to play vidja games; they don't want to be treated like a mythical creature nor do they want to be treated like they're some poor defenseless thing that "needs" to be "defended".




I know it's something completely different, but I get the same sort of shit for being trans.  Some dumbass person used to think she was my "friend" and would constantly -stalk- "be friends" with me and whenever I got into a argument would strive in like a white knight on a horse to "defend" me.
Me, "dude that's a stupid fucking statement you said cause there's no way that portals like the game could work cause that would require hologram theory to be true"
other person, "Well hologram theory hasn't been dis-proven yet cause the pixelation effect would only be apparent on the scale of strings which we haven't been able to take pictures of yet"
-stalker- 'helpful' friend, "You're just being mean to her cause you're transphobic!"
other person, "What the fuck are you talking about?"
me, "Just ignore her; you'd need a camera capable of seeing atomic movement to see her neural structure.  So anyways; yeah you have a point we don't have a camera that can see that small yet but the probability of hologram theory being right is very small.  Chances are if there was such things as portals they would oscillate with the M-brane and be more along the lines of amorphous blobs."
-dumbass- "Is this mean person making fun of you?"
other person, "What the fuck is she talking about?"
"I gave up ages ago trying to figure out what the flying fuck she's talking about"

You should hear some of the shit I've gotten in the past for being trans.  You would think homophobes would be the worst of it, but no; most homophobes are just dumb people who listen to foxnews thinking it's the bible.  I just straight up burnt all the bridges with everyone I used to know before I went to my current school cause they wouldn't leave me the fuck alone.
